ai_chat.name: Professional AI Assistant
ai_chat.description: AI chat interface with moderation and governance for exclusive professional use
ai_chat.title: Professional AI Assistant
ai_chat.full_description: Intelligent conversational assistant to help you with your daily tasks
ai_chat.welcome_message:
Hello! I am your professional AI assistant. I can help you with your professional tasks while ensuring our exchanges remain appropriate and compliant with company policies.

**What can I do for you?**

I can help you with:
- Document and data analysis
- Professional content writing
- Information research
- Calculations and projections
- Translation
- Summaries and syntheses
- And much more!

**Active moderation:** All your requests are analyzed to ensure professional use.

errors.timeout_details: The server is taking too long to process your request.
errors.timeout_cause_complex: The request is too complex for the AI
errors.timeout_solution_split: Split your document into multiple parts
errors.timeout_solution_retry: Try again in a few moments
errors.backend_not_running: The backend server is not running
errors.backend_details: Connection to AI Chat server failed. The backend server is not accessible.
errors.image_type_invalid: Only images are accepted (JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.)
errors.blocked_default: Your message was blocked by moderation.

moderation.title: Moderation Settings

general.title: General Settings
general.enabled_help: When disabled, all content is allowed without moderation.
general.name: Policy Name

domains.title: Business Domains
domains.description: Configure which business domains are allowed or blocked. Professional domains are shown with a briefcase icon.
domains.strict_matching_help: When enabled, only explicitly allowed domains are permitted.

content.title: Content Types
content.analyze_documents_help: Analyze actual document content, not just metadata.
content.analyze_images_help: Use vision AI to analyze image content.

sensitive.title: Sensitive Data Detection
sensitive.allow_company_emails_help: Allow emails from whitelisted company domains.

thresholds.title: Moderation Thresholds
thresholds.min_professional_score_help: Content with a score below this threshold will be blocked.
thresholds.strict_mode_help: When enabled, medium-risk content is also blocked.
thresholds.block_uncertainty_help: Block content when AI confidence is below the minimum threshold.

rules.title: Custom Rules
rules.blocked_keywords_help: Content containing these keywords will always be blocked.
rules.blocked_phrases_help: Content containing these phrases will always be blocked.
rules.allowed_keywords_help: Content containing these keywords bypasses certain checks.
rules.allowed_phrases_help: Content containing these phrases bypasses certain checks.

ai.title: AI Analysis Configuration
ai.enabled_help: Use AI for semantic content analysis. Disabling falls back to keyword matching.
ai.model_help: Specific model to use. Leave empty to use the default for the provider.

nvidia_multimodal.title: NVIDIA Multimodal Agent
nvidia_multimodal.subtitle: Full NVIDIA AI Stack - Llama 3.1 + FLUX.1-schnell + Magpie TTS + Audio2Face 3D
nvidia_multimodal.welcome: Hello! I'm the NVIDIA Multimodal Agent. I can generate text, images, audio and animate a 3D avatar. Ask me to create a presentation, explain a concept with visuals, or any other multimodal content!
nvidia_multimodal.api_key_hint: Click ⚙️ to configure your NVIDIA API key (build.nvidia.com)
nvidia_multimodal.placeholder: Ask me to create a presentation, generate an image, read a summary...

errors.api_key_missing: NVIDIA API key required. Click ⚙️ to configure it.
errors.backend_unreachable: NVIDIA Multimodal service unavailable. Check that the service is running.

nvidia_vista3d.api_key_hint: Click the settings button to configure your NVIDIA API key (build.nvidia.com)
nvidia_vista3d.all_mode_hint: No class selected: the model will automatically segment all detected structures.
nvidia_vista3d.processing_hint: 3D segmentation may take a few minutes depending on image size.

nvidia_fourcastnet.subtitle: Global Weather Forecasting - 73 atmospheric variables - 0.25° resolution
nvidia_fourcastnet.api_key_hint: Click the settings button to configure your NVIDIA API key (build.nvidia.com)
nvidia_fourcastnet.all_mode_hint: No variable selected: default variables (t2m, u10m, msl, tcwv, z500) will be displayed.
nvidia_fourcastnet.processing_hint: Global weather forecasting may take a few minutes depending on the number of simulation steps.

nvidia_openfold3.title: NVIDIA OpenFold3
nvidia_openfold3.subtitle: 3D Protein Structure Prediction - Deep Learning - Up to 2000 amino acids
nvidia_openfold3.api_key_hint: Click the settings button to configure your NVIDIA API key (build.nvidia.com)
nvidia_openfold3.sequence_placeholder: Enter or paste a protein sequence (amino acids)
nvidia_openfold3.input_hint: Enter a protein sequence in single-letter amino acid format (e.g. MVLSPAD...) or FASTA format. Max 2000 residues.
nvidia_openfold3.processing_hint: 3D structure prediction may take up to several minutes depending on sequence length.
nvidia_openfold3.viewer_hint: Drag to rotate, scroll to zoom, click on a residue for details
nvidia_openfold3.empty_description: Enter a protein sequence and predict its 3D structure using NVIDIA OpenFold3 deep learning model. Visualize and explore the predicted structure interactively.

errors.api_key_missing: NVIDIA API key required. Click the settings button to configure it.
errors.backend_unreachable: NVIDIA OpenFold3 service unavailable. Check that the service is running.

nvidia_grounding_dino.title: NVIDIA Grounding DINO
nvidia_grounding_dino.subtitle: Zero-Shot Object Detection - Text-Guided - Any Object
nvidia_grounding_dino.api_key_hint: Click the settings button to configure your NVIDIA API key (build.nvidia.com)
nvidia_grounding_dino.drop_zone: Click or drag an image here
nvidia_grounding_dino.prompt_hint: Separate objects with ' . ' (e.g. car . person . dog). The model detects any object you describe.
nvidia_grounding_dino.empty_description: Upload an image and describe the objects you want to detect. Grounding DINO identifies any object from text descriptions, no training required.
nvidia_grounding_dino.feature_detection: Precise bounding boxes on any object
nvidia_grounding_dino.feature_text: Describe what to find in natural language
nvidia_grounding_dino.feature_zeroshot: No training needed, works on any object

errors.api_key_missing: NVIDIA API key required. Click the settings button to configure it.
errors.backend_unreachable: NVIDIA Grounding DINO service unavailable. Check that the service is running.
